instruction: Create a list of tasks that a software engineer might be asked to do.
output:
A software engineer might be asked to perform the following tasks: 

1. Analyze and design software systems 
2. Develop, test and maintain software 
3. Develop software applications 
4. Troubleshoot problems 
5. Enhance software performance 
6. Create documentation for users 
7. Train users and provide technical support 
8. Optimize existing code 
9. Develop data models 
10. Implement security measures 
11. Write algorithms 
12. Evaluate emerging software technologies 
13. Monitor system performance 
14. Research and recommend software products 
15. Work in a team environment 
16. Write automated tests
